title: alastantiger
author: alastantiger
content: If you're a Bitcoin enthusiast who is single as a Pringle because you're stuck in your apartment reading and keeping up with the latest in the Bitcoin space while helping the community grow and do whatever it is that bitcoiners do.Or perhaps you've lost your charm, and you're looking for a good pickup line; this new Bitcoin ad will help you find girlfriends (boyfriends) during the upcoming bull run.Go watch it and tell me if it is something that can work for you. https://twitter.com/hrtlndbitcoin/status/1732481276920078394?t=sCau_faVt1dLOTZThnIl4w&s=19

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: Hehehehe, its quite hilarious but if you notice it's an ad which means the girl was paid to act like she likes it. Some who haven't heard of Bitcoin may be curious and may want to know more, hence creating an avenue for more discussion and possible relationship whereas there's those who don't dig it and may be put out by the guy's approach and even consider it a lame effort at striking a conversation.

comments.author: uchegod-21
comments.body: Quote from: Majestic-milf on December 15, 2023, 01:44:43 PM Hehehehe, its quite hilarious but if you notice it's an ad which means the girl was paid to act like she likes it. Some who haven't heard of Bitcoin may be curious and may want to know more, hence creating an avenue for more discussion and possible relationship whereas there's those who don't dig it and may be put out by the guy's approach and even consider it a lame effort at striking a conversation.The ad was not satisfying to watch honestly. I mean there's no real life correlation. You walk into a public space and hands your head to a stranger and the stranger listens and heard bitcoin and immediately fell in love  OP, where did you bring in the story of bull run or something else. If you are stocked in your computer, you wouldn't have the opportunity to travel and meet a girl to listen your head set. Maybe another line of story would have been better.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: yeah, no thanks, from past experience, having a girlfriend/boyfriend is expensive. I'd rather stay single at the moment and enjoy life and enjoy the "upcoming bull market" for myself. anyway, I feel like this thread should be on Bitcoin Discussion board instead of Beginners & Help.

comments.author: hd49728
comments.body: Quote from: alastantiger on December 15, 2023, 12:18:31 PMOr perhaps you've lost your charm, and you're looking for a good pickup line; this new Bitcoin ad will help you find girlfriends (boyfriends) during the upcoming bull run.I don't like this idea.If you want to find a boyfriend or a girlfriend, then a wife or a husband, you will not want to find a person who comes to you only because of money, because your are rich. That relationship will not end with a happy ending because life is never smooth and even you continue to be rich, a person who comes to you not because of love, will not stay with you forever.This is one of a most weird and in my opinion, stupid idea.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Lmao why are ya'll serious this is definitely made only as a meme. The "There is no second best" sound clip is from Michael Saylor's hilarious speech on YouTube that has been meme-d into oblivion: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MNf97XgBdTc

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: Quote from: alastantiger on December 15, 2023, 12:18:31 PMIf you're a Bitcoin enthusiast who is single as a Pringle because you're stuck in your apartment reading and keeping up with the latest in the Bitcoin space while helping the community grow and do whatever it is that bitcoiners do.Or perhaps you've lost your charm, and you're looking for a good pickup line; this new Bitcoin ad will help you find girlfriends (boyfriends) during the upcoming bull run.Is this for real, I mean this seems totally off topic because that ad was totally fullshit (hehe) sorry was not good enough and baseless. I thought this ad might be consists of some platform where girls and boys who are crypto enthusiastic will come together and can ping each other and can make friends with each other.But this was totally unexpected, and what make you think we can make friends by watching this ad? Or you were also kidding in a serious way! (i mean are you being sarcastic). Well, I will say I really have lost my charm and interest in how to talk with girls because few days back a girl messages me on messenger and after few words she said send me your pic and I top level skeptical and not falling to sentiments, and the one who always gives a  thought to the acts that I am making, said to that girl why would I send you a pic.I have many pics on my profile while you don't have any so why don't you send me your pics. Well, this led our chat to an end. The point is, I realized at that time, I am being so optimistic about my career and investments that I have losing oe not gaining any skills in getting a girl. I hope my parents never read this reply hehehe (they are not on BTT).

comments.author: sokani
comments.body: The clip started well and I thought the dude is going to sing a bitcoin song or a poem, only to hear this words:   "Which one is the best crypto asset? Bitcoin is the best crypto asset.Which one is the second best crypto asset? There's no second best crypto asset..."If you watch clip carefully from the beginning, you'd see the guy rehearsing in the studio with guitar and keyboard, so why working in the studio, only to say few words at the end and not make music? Could it been doctored? I don't find the ad interesting though.

comments.author: kawetsriyanto
comments.body: Quote from: alastantiger on December 15, 2023, 12:18:31 PMIf you're a Bitcoin enthusiast who is single as a Pringle because you're stuck in your apartment reading and keeping up with the latest in the Bitcoin space while helping the community grow and do whatever it is that bitcoiners do.Or perhaps you've lost your charm, and you're looking for a good pickup line; this new Bitcoin ad will help you find girlfriends (boyfriends) during the upcoming bull run.We mustn't experience this. Investing in Bitcoin doesn't mean to torturing us. We don't need to be trapped in our apartment, we can hang out or take vacation although we invest in Bitcoin. We should take a loot at the price chart the whole day, or we update information about Bitcoin every minute. Those are too much behavior of a Bitcoiner.If we want to get a girlfriend, it is a must to socialize with others. We must go out from our apartment, we have to meet a lot of people. Living in an apartment only, shouldn't be a good life, we must be easy to feel bored with very limited activities. So, although we are heading the bullrun season, we must have time to socialize with other people.

comments.author: Hewlet
comments.body: Quote from: alastantiger on December 15, 2023, 12:18:31 PMIf you're a Bitcoin enthusiast who is single as a Pringle because you're stuck in your apartment reading and keeping up with the latest in the Bitcoin space while helping the community grow and do whatever it is that bitcoiners do.Or perhaps you've lost your charm, and you're looking for a good pickup line; this new Bitcoin ad will help you find girlfriends (boyfriends) during the upcoming bull run.Go watch it and tell me if it is something that can work for you. https://twitter.com/hrtlndbitcoin/status/1732481276920078394?t=sCau_faVt1dLOTZThnIl4w&s=19the ad is damn boring!!!!I mean, their are better ways to do stuff like this that could send the intended message within some couple of moment.In reality, if you meet a random girl and try this on her, most of them will shun you off because that's obviously a rude way to start up a conversation with a lady.

comments.author: Asiska02
comments.body: The ad makes sense since at least it is passing a message which was well passed and received. This is not enough to make you get a girlfriend because if she is not interested in bitcoin, she can’t be compelled with those persuasive words she was listening to through the headphones. Many might feel this is boring just as I thought too, but the best part was that a valuable information was passed which is the aim of the Ad video.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: Bitcoin is expected to do everything at this point, and it's actually becoming a joke, the fact that Bitcoin is assumed to be the savoir of the masses can cause panic when ever the bear market shows up.I think we should sieve the type of message we send out regarding Bitcoin so many of this messages can be misleading and can cause big time panic.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: alastantiger on December 15, 2023, 12:18:31 PMIf you're a Bitcoin enthusiast who is single as a Pringle because you're stuck in your apartment reading and keeping up with the latest in the Bitcoin space while helping the community grow and do whatever it is that bitcoiners do.Or perhaps you've lost your charm, and you're looking for a good pickup line; this new Bitcoin ad will help you find girlfriends (boyfriends) during the upcoming bull run.I may not be that interested on the ad to that extent because it's not giving the detailed process on how it all happened, but we can always make use of bitcoin related opportunities in finding who our life partner or spouse should be, these is a digital network that comes with diverse areas of applications and regardless of where we finds ourselves on it, we can always take a lifetime advantage from it as such that we find our life partner, things we watch on movie drama were actually what happened in real life before some were being acted.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: This bullshit. Op is it that you were out of topics to write upon that you came up with this lunatic? At first I was even thinking that you were referring to this forum to get a girlfriend or a boyfriend as Bitcoin community. To see a pro Bitcoin girlfriend to date in real life is hard but boys are full every corner in the world. And even at that I don't think it is possible to see a girl here to date. Unless the admin create women board for it before you can see more women in the forum. If not we tag everyone here as guys. I know only few girls and one woman in the forum. And op what provided as a link with the video can't work out the you you presented it.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: lol I don't get it. It wouldn't sound smooth in real life. Only works if the girl also knows what BTC is. But using BTC to find a girl will likely find a gold digger.Whoever funded the ad, has a very peculiar way of attracting a girl. Making a girl listen to a headset while you don't know each other is creepy.

comments.author: Zlantann
comments.body: Quote from: alastantiger on December 15, 2023, 12:18:31 PMIf you're a Bitcoin enthusiast who is single as a Pringle because you're stuck in your apartment reading and keeping up with the latest in the Bitcoin space while helping the community grow and do whatever it is that bitcoiners do.Or perhaps you've lost your charm, and you're looking for a good pickup line; this new Bitcoin ad will help you find girlfriends (boyfriends) during the upcoming bull run.Go watch it and tell me if it is something that can work for you. https://twitter.com/hrtlndbitcoin/status/1732481276920078394?t=sCau_faVt1dLOTZThnIl4w&s=19I was expecting to see a social media platform that has been launched to help Bitcoiners connect. I was glad because we have few females in the Bitcoin space and it would have been interesting to connect with some of them But it turned out to be a mere advertisement. The advert had a nice concept but I was expecting to hear an instrumental and the sound of the voice of the young man. But I was disappointed to hear just a few words without melody. However, nobody should lose his or her emotional relationship because of Bitcoin. We should go out and catch some fun because so many things in life are far precious than money. I am always pleased with any event or activity that is designed to promote Bitcoin, so kudos to the producers of the ads.

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: No need for that for married Bitcoin hodlers.  But try it if you are looking for some girlfriend/boyfriend. Well, it make yourself good and try to get into conversation with communities that have a lot of newbies in your locality and you'll sure find someone who's interesting that's interested knowing more about Bitcoin.If you see that person, start the conversation and that's going to make a history of.....heartbreak.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: alastantiger on December 15, 2023, 12:18:31 PMIf you're a Bitcoin enthusiast who is single as a Pringle because you're stuck in your apartment reading and keeping up with the latest in the Bitcoin space while helping the community grow and do whatever it is that bitcoiners do.Or perhaps you've lost your charm, and you're looking for a good pickup line; this new Bitcoin ad will help you find girlfriends (boyfriends) during the upcoming bull run.This charms work probably on non bitcoiners ladies. Of course they will be amazed on how you have an investment with bitcoin and as they gazed with the price of it surely they can be somehow attracted but thats not work to all since a lot even girls can earn bitcoin or multiply it on her own.

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: Quote from: Zlantann on December 15, 2023, 06:44:16 PMI was expecting to see a social media platform that has been launched to help Bitcoiners connect.  I was thinking the same when I read the topic title. I assumed it was about a dating app for Bitcoiners like Christian mingle for Christians or millionaire dating for the elites. Judging from the comments, I think I have a fair idea of the ad content. The content creator behind the ad should have known that his “game” is not practical and wouldn’t work in a real life situation. PS - It wouldn’t be a bad idea if we had a dating app for bitcoin enthusiasts.

comments.author: aysg76
comments.body: But for me keeping my bitcoin story limited is important instead of walking to strangers and I assume this is not how it  should happen.We are not socializing through bitcoin especially in this manner although we as community have strong connection because of it but using it as payment mode or as an asset is more good but these ads are just pure nonsense according to me.
